text: Giovanni Sacco (25 September 1943 - 17 December 2020) was an Italian footballer. He played as a midfielder. Sacco was born in San Damiano d'Asti, Italy. He played for Juventus F.C., Atalanta B.C. and A.C. Reggiana 1919. His career lasted from 1962 to 1976. Sacco died on 17 December 2020 in Asti, Italy from COVID-19 at the age of 77.Addio a Giovanni Sacco, campione di calcio e sandamianese doc ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy Category:Footballers from Piedmont
title: Giovanni Sacco
